description:
This is a market on how much 'Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire' (2024) will gross domestically on its opening weekend. The “Domestic Weekend” tab on https://www.boxofficemojo.com/title/tt14539740/ will be used to resolve this market once the values for the 3-day opening weekend (March 29 - March 31) are final (i.e. not studio estimates).

This market will resolve to "Yes" if 'Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire' (2024) grosses more than $80,000,000 on its 3-day opening weekend. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

Please note, this market will resolve according to the Box Office Mojo numbers under Domestic Weekend for the 3-day weekend (which typically includes Thursday's previews), regardless of whether domestic refers to only the USA, or to USA and Canada, etc.

If there is no final data available by April 4, 2024, 11:59 PM ET, another credible resolution source will be chosen.

markets.question: 'Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire' over $80m opening weekend?

title: 'Godzilla x Kong' over $80m opening weekend?
